name: My 2021 Reads
description:
Inspired by this reddit post, I created 2021 Reads for readers who prefer to read e-books, like myself, and for others who want to have their colored calendars digitally. 

Have fun tracking your reading journey using different colors.

Look at your full 2021 Reads calendar and see how big you've progressed.

Isn't it exciting to see your 2021 Reads calendar fully-colored by the end of the year?  😊

Features:

  • Full 2021 Reads Calendar
  • Color Wheel (52+ Colors!)
  • Reading Milestones

Future Features:

  • Import/Export Data
  • In-App Tutorial

I'm open for suggestions and improvements. Hope you enjoy using this app!
